title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5704.4 - Special toll rates
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5704.4 - Special toll rates

State Regulations

The authority's special toll rates, effective July 12, 2006, are as follows: (a) Truck toll scrip. 120 fifty-cent tickets for $60, less 10 percent discount for payment in
advance. (b) Passenger discount
program. 75 trips for $90, valid for a two-month period from the date of
issuance. 60 trips for $100, valid for six-month period from the date
of issuance. 20 trips for $37, valid for six-month period from the date of
issuance. (c) Special toll
promotions are specifically authorized by the authority as follows: (1)

Retail organizations shall receive a 25
percent discount from the normal $2 fare by purchasing a book containing 50
crossings for $75. (2)

School, community and/or not-for-profit organizations shall receive a 50 percent
discount from the normal $2 fare by purchasing a book containing 50 crossings
at $75. (d) Commercial
discount program (volume-based discount). Truck charges $20,000 to $29,999
annually - 5 percent discount - based upon a rebate annually. Truck charges $30,000 to $39,999 annually - 8 percent
discount - based upon a rebate annually. Truck charges $40,000 annually - 10 percent discount - based
upon a rebate annually. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5704.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
